direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve reward history but for different types of products (flexible vs. locked).
Both methods handle historical records with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods deal with flexible product records, making test cases for one applicable to the other.
Both methods access and manipulate similar resources related to flexible products.
Both methods may modify the object's state in similar manners, especially concerning account-related data.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the request handler is required before making any API calls.
Fetching the flexible product list might be necessary to set up the context for reward history retrieval.
Both methods return JSON responses that need to be verified for correctness.
